title: Why is there no 5 vs 5 best of 10 Arena
body: Just think that a mode like this would be a lot more fun as opposed to something like twisted treeline or Aram. Why not just log into an arena with lotsa moneez and buy a bunch of different items before start and team fight???

replies.body: Nah.....we already got this in ARAM. It's just redundant.

Actually, it's not.

I would be down for a 5v5 team death match. Put a kill goal on it. Something like 100 kills to win. A small arena style map. No turrets. No nexus. Just pure team fighting.

Leagues champions are balanced around a few ideas, one of them being that they are stronger or weaker at different points in the game. The OP's idea would create a less balanced ARAM, since there'd be no early/mid game and you can pick the champions with amazing late game. The meta would rarely change in that mode too, since it's rare for a champion to become better at late game without a drastic change to themselves or an item they rely on.

It would be fun for a little while, but it would get stale *very* fast.

So make it a rare RGM.

Personally this doesn't sound like something I'd EVER be interested in, but maybe the "1v1 me noob" tryhards might enjoy it?

Team fighting is for objectives
You wouldn't just teamfight without a goal
